name: Commander (vegechick123)
description:
two player games

In this game 2 player can shoot "command" as bullet,after the hit you will get the control of opponent's character .

The goal of this game is to get score by opponent's death and getting hearts 

Player1:

W:Jump  AD:Move  S:Shoot

Player2:

UpArrow:Jump  LeftRightArrow:Move   DownArrow:Shoot
